title: Level 7 board problem!
body:
Why is it that, i am not able to post comments on certain posts but where else on few posts that I came across I was able to post comments, is this a known issue or only a glitch or error on my side.
Error: Must be level 7 or higher to post a comment

replies.body: Sometimes an account needs to sync up with the boards when posting for the first time.  Your post here may have done just that, so you should be able to post without issues now.  Let me know!
